interpretation: The Ferris wheel emoji represents cycles, ups and downs, and the passage of time. This card reminds us that life is full of highs and lows, and that we must learn to ride the waves of change. The Ferris wheel also represents a sense of adventure and exploration, as we embark on new experiences and take risks. This card encourages us to embrace the unknown and find excitement in the journey. However, it is important to remember that all things must come to an end, and the Ferris wheel reminds us to appreciate the present moment and cherish the memories we create. Keywords associated with this card include: cycles, change, adventure, risk, excitement, time, and memories.
